name: Smartwool PhD Ski Light Elite Pattern Socks - Unisex
categories: PhD Ski Light Elite Pattern Socks
description: These lightweight ski socks have strategic cushioned zones for comfort, but the rest of the sock is kept light, so they slide inside performance-fit boots.Made of soft, itch-free merino wool, with nylon and elastane to maintain fit.Banded fit system features elastic arches and ankle braces, with flex zones to eliminate bunching, slipping, and sagging.Mesh ventilation zones increase breathability and improve temperature control.Flat knit side panels and toe seams reduce compression.
